text:
Topping the Billboard charts and holding the top ranks on iTunes and Spotify, the music nominees for the 2019 E! People's Choice Awards cover some heavy-hitting artists. In comparison to so many awards ceremonies, however, there's not much like the E! People's Choice Awards voting where you, the general public, get the power to select the winners each year. While this can always be exciting for fans of today's biggest music sensations, it can also be a lot to consider. That being said, it has to be done.

From the top songs and albums of the year to the best male and female artists, each music category for the E! People's Choice Awards include a range of top stars. We're talking the ultimate hit-song generator Drake, female rap powerhouse Cardi B, Mr. Nice Guy Ed Sheeran, and the sweet Taylor Swift, among so many other great artists. Of all the E! People's Choice Awards 2019 nominees for music, though, who do you think will get the most votes? Could Shawn Mendes take the Male Artist of 2019? Will BTS take the Group of 2019 award? That'll be up to you fans to decide.

If you can't get enough of voting, go ahead and check out the 45th E! People's Choice Awards nominations below and vote up the musicians you think have the best chance of topping their category.
title: Which E! People's Choice Awards 2019 Music Nominees Will Win?
